Name: tha-groupfromthesoc-la
Author: Group From The Society Of Graduates Of Thai Universities And Institutes

Translations.Text: læa ma lak kimaknxy nı chan fa thanghlay nan ka rcha faxahˌ khxng phwk khea ca mi xanwy prayochn xan dı (kæ phwk khea)wentæ hlang ca kxallxhˌ ca thrng xnumati kæ phu thi phraxngkh thrng prasngkh læa thrng phx phrathay
thæcring brrda phu thi mi sraththa tx wan prlok nan nænxn phwk khea ca tang chux mla xik ahˌ pen phes hying
læa phwk khea mimi khwam ru nı reuxng nan ley phwk khea mi di pti bat tam sing dı nx cak kar khad khane læa thæcring kar khad khane nan ca mi xanwy prayochn xan dı kæ khwam cring di
dangnan cea cng hlb hlik hı hang cak phu phin hlangcak kar raluk nukthung rea (xallxhˌ)læa khea midi prarthna xun dı nxkcak kar mi chiwit xyu nı lok ni theanan

nan khux sud yxd hæng khwam ru khxng phwk khea læw thæcring phracea khxng cea nan phraxngkh thrng ru di ying thung phu thi hlng xxk cak thang khxng phraxngkh læa phraxngkh thrng ru di ying thung phu thi xyu nı næwthang thi thuk txng (hi da yahˌ)

læa sing thi xyu nı chan fa thanghlay læa sing thi xyu nı phændin nan pen krrmsiththi khx ngxallxhˌ pheux phraxngkh ca thrng txbthæn brrda phu kratha khwam chaw tam thi phwk khea praphvti læa ca thrng txbthæn brrda phu kratha khwam di dwy khwam di

kæ brrda phu hlik leiyng hang cak kar thabap hıy læa tha sing lamk thanghlay wentæ khwam phid phlad leknxy thæcring phracea khxng cea nan thrng pen phu kwangkhwang nı kar xphay phraxngkh thrng rucak phwk cea di ying meux khrang bangkeid phwk cea cak phændin læa meux khrang phwk cea pen thark xyu nı khrrph khxng marda khxng phwk cea dang phwk cea xya sædng khwam brisuththi kætaw khxng phwk cea xeng pheraa phraxngkh thrng ru di ying thung phu thi mi khwam yakerng
